sourcesContent:
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  BarElement,
  ArcElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  Filler
} from 'chart.js';

// Registrar todos os componentes do Chart.js necessários
ChartJS.register(
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  LineElement,
  BarElement,
  ArcElement,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  Filler
);

export default ChartJS;
